name: 3 Fighters
description:
The most unique jet fighters game is here!
The galaxy is at war. Human is in danger of being enslaved. It’s time to fight against aliens for the human’s survival in the galaxy.
Swing your jet to move ahead and beat your enemies in fighter jets. In this jet fight, make sure that you are using your all fighting skills against the enemy. And the special thing is that you control 3 characters at the same time, so take advantages of it to overcome challenges and save the world.
Features
+) New power-ups and weapons
+) Vivid sound effect and lifelike graphics
+) Challenging levels and powerful Boss battles
+) Different types of enemy and battlefields
What are you hesitating about? Just download it!
